'''''Wind-Chasing Adventurer''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Mondstadt: The City of Wind and Song]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to complete 5 Open World mechanism-activated [[Time Trial Challenge]]s in Mondstadt (excludes the Dragonspine area).
